components: STEERING,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,AIR BAGS,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL,SEATS
summary: PROBLEMS WITH CRUISE CONTROL AND AIR BAG LIGHT.*MR  THE CRUISE CONTROL LIGHT ON THE STEERING WHEEL REMAINED LIT, OFTEN FOR SEVERAL DAYS.  THE AIR BAG LIGHT ILLUMINATES INTERMITTENTLY BUT THE DEALER INDICATED THAT NOTHING COULD BE DONE UNLESS THE LIGHT WAS ON WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS BOUGHT TO THE DEALER.  THE POWER STEERING PUMP HAS BEEN REPLACED, THE ENGINE BLOCK CRACKED.  THE DRIVER'S SEAT FAILED.  *NM
